<main id="main">

    <section class="post">

        <header class="major">
            <span class="date">August 3, 2021</span>
            <h1>Privacy Policy</h1>
                <p class="content">Privacy Policy Terms</p>
        </header>


        <div class="content">
            <p></p><p>Welcome to use 7u studio for product development. 7u studio (also known as 北京拾音科技文化有限公司) is registered at 1st floor, Building 24, No.1 Xierqi West Road, Haidian District, Beijing.</p><p>This Privacy Policy describes (" MUTRIX, "" Our") privacy practices and how we handle personal information collected through links to this Privacy Policy, including through our website and mobile applications (collectively, the "Services"), and through social media, marketing activities and other activities described in this Privacy Policy.<br>We may provide individuals with additional or supplemental privacy policies for specific products or services that we provide when collecting personal information.</p><ol><li>Personal information we collect<br>Personal information you may provide to us through the service or otherwise:<br>Account and personal data provided when you register or update your account with the service.<br>Such as your name, email address, username and password, user ID, billing and shipping address, date of birth, profile picture, height, weight, devices you own, activity preferences, music preferences, followers and people you follow, summaries of your activities, and any other information you add to your account profile.<br>Transaction data.<br>For example, information related to or required for you to complete an order on or through the service, including order numbers and transaction history.<br>A third party.<br>We may also receive personal information from other sources, such as: We may collect information from a third party platform or social media network if you choose to log into the Service through that platform or social media network or otherwise associate your account on that third party platform or network with your account through the Service. For example, this information might include your Facebook username, user ID, profile picture, cover photo, and the network you belong to (for example, school, workplace). You may also have the opportunity to provide us with other information, such as a list of your friends or contacts and your email address, through third party platforms or networks.<br>Automatic data collection.<br>We and our service providers may automatically record information about you, your computer or mobile device, and your interactions with the services, communications with us and other online services, such as: Device data, such as your computer or mobile device's operating system type and version, manufacturer and model, browser type, screen resolution, RAM and disk size, CPU usage, device type (e.g., phone, tablet), IP address, language Settings, device time zone, mobile device carrier, radio/network information (e.g., Wi-Fi, LTE, 3G) and general location information, such as city, state, or other country area.</li><li>How do we use your personal information<br>We may use your personal information for the following purposes or otherwise describe it at the time of collection:<br>Service delivery.<br>We may use your personal information for:<br>Provide, operate and improve services and our business;<br>Create and maintain your user profile on the service;<br>Communicate with you about the service, including sending announcements, updates, security alerts, and support and administration messages;<br>Research and development.<br>We may use your personal information for research and development purposes, including analysis and improvement of services and our business.<br>Compliance and protection.<br>We may use your personal information for:<br>Comply with applicable law, lawful requirements and legal procedures, such as responding to subpoenas or requests from government authorities;<br>To protect our, your or others' rights, privacy, safety or property (including by filing and defending legal claims);<br>Review our services and internal processes for compliance with legal and contractual requirements or our internal policies;<br>Enforce the terms and conditions of management services;<br>Prevent, identify, investigate and deter fraudulent, harmful, unauthorized, unethical or illegal activities, including cyber attacks, identity theft and negative actions against the service.<br>With your permission.<br>Under certain circumstances, we may specifically seek your consent to collect, use or share your personal information, such as when required by law.</li><li>How do we share your personal information<br>We may share your personal information with the following parties, as otherwise stated in this Privacy Policy or at the time of collection.<br>Service provider.<br>Third parties (such as hosting, information technology, email delivery, marketing, customer support and data analytics) that provide services on our behalf or help us operate services or our business.<br>Payment processor.<br>Any payment card information you use to make purchases on the Services is collected and processed by us directly through Oculus.<br>The authorities, etc.<br>Law enforcement, governmental authorities and private parties as we sincerely believe are necessary or appropriate for the above compliance and protection purposes.<br>Transferee of business.<br>In the event of a business transaction (or the negotiation and due diligence of such transaction) involving the Company's divestitures, mergers, acquisitions, reorganizations, sales or otherwise disposition of all or any part of its business or assets or equity by the acquirer and other relevant participants (including in connection with bankruptcy or similar proceedings), we will use our best efforts to require the Recipient to comply with this Privacy Policy.<br>Other users and the public.<br>Your personal data and other user-generated content (other than messages) may be visible to other users of the Service. For example, if you choose to provide your personal data or other personal information to them through the Service, such as when you provide comments, reviews, survey responses or share other content, other users of the Service may have access to your information. You may also choose to share your information with third party platforms, such as Facebook, or otherwise share information on social media pages on third party platforms. We are not responsible for any use of this information, which can be seen, collected and used by others, including being cached, copied, screenshot or stored elsewhere by others.</li><li>Your choice<br>For your personal information, you have the following options.<br>Access or update your information. If you have registered an account with us through the Service, you can view and update certain account information by logging into the account.<br>Cookies.<br>Cookies and similar technologies help with some of our automated data collection.<br>Refuse to provide information.<br>We need to collect personal information to provide certain services. If you do not provide information that we consider required or mandatory, we may not be able to provide these services.<br>Delete your account.<br>If you would like to request the closure of your account, please contact us.</li><li>Be safe<br>We employ a number of technical and physical safeguards designed to protect the personal information we collect. However, there is no guarantee that data transmission over the Internet or other networks is 100% secure. Therefore, while we strive to protect the information transmitted through the services, we cannot guarantee 100% security of your personal information and you transfer such information at your own risk.</li><li>Keep it<br>We normally retain personal information for the purposes for which we collect it, including to provide, protect and improve services, to meet any legal, accounting or reporting requirements, to establish or defend legal claims or to prevent fraud. In order to determine the appropriate retention period for personal information, We may consider such factors as the amount, nature and sensitivity of personal information, the risk of damage that may result from unauthorized use or disclosure of your personal information, and the purpose for which we process your personal information. Personal information and whether we can achieve these purposes by other means, as well as applicable legal requirements.<br>When we no longer need the personal information we have collected about you, we may delete it, anonymize it, or isolate it from further processing.</li><li>Changes to this Privacy Policy<br>We reserve the right to modify this Privacy policy at any time. If we make a material change to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you by updating the date of this Privacy Policy, Posting it on the Services, and taking any other steps required by law. Subject to such other requirements, any changes to this Privacy Policy will become effective upon our release of a modified version (or as otherwise stated at the time of publication). If you do not agree with the revised privacy policy, please do not use the service.<br>How to Contact us<br>If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our information processing practices, you can contact us in the following ways:<br>E-mail: <a>team7u@163.com</a></li></ol><p><strong>隐私政策</strong></p><p><strong>欢迎您使用7u studio开发产品（北京拾音科技文化有限公司又称为7u studio，公司注册地址为北京市海淀区西二旗西路1号院24号楼1层103-2-3）。</strong></p><h4 id="%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E6%8F%8F%E8%BF%B0%E4%BA%86%EF%BC%88%E2%80%9Cmutrix%E2%80%9D%E3%80%81%E2%80%9C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E2%80%9D%EF%BC%89%E7%9A%84%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%83%AF%E4%BE%8B%EF%BC%8C%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E9%93%BE%E6%8E%A5%E5%88%B0%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E5%92%8C%E7%A7%BB%E5%8A%A8%E5%BA%94%E7%94%A8%E7%A8%8B%E5%BA%8F%EF%BC%88%E7%BB%9F%E7%A7%B0%E4%B8%BA%E2%80%9C%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E2%80%9D%EF%BC%89%EF%BC%8C%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E7%A4%BE%E4%BA%A4%E5%AA%92%E4%BD%93%E3%80%81%E8%90%A5%E9%94%80%E6%B4%BB%E5%8A%A8%E5%92%8C%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E4%B8%AD%E6%8F%8F%E8%BF%B0%E7%9A%84%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E6%B4%BB%E5%8A%A8%E3%80%82"><strong>本隐私政策描述了（“MUTRIX”、“我们”）的隐私惯例，以及我们如何处理通过链接到本隐私政策收集的个人信息，包括我们的网站和移动应用程序（统称为“服务”），以及通过社交媒体、营销活动和本隐私政策中描述的其他活动。</strong></h4><p></p><h4 id="%E5%AF%B9%E4%BA%8E%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%9C%A8%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E6%97%B6%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E7%9A%84%E7%89%B9%E5%AE%9A%E4%BA%A7%E5%93%81%E6%88%96%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E5%90%91%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E9%A2%9D%E5%A4%96%E6%88%96%E8%A1%A5%E5%85%85%E7%9A%84%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E3%80%82"><strong>对于我们在收集个人信息时提供的特定产品或服务，我们可能会向个人提供额外或补充的隐私政策。</strong></h4><h4 id="1-%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF"><strong>1. 我们收集的个人信息</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%82%A8%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E6%88%96%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E7%BB%99%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%9A"><strong>您可能通过服务或其他方式提供给我们的个人信息：</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%82%A8%E5%9C%A8%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E4%B8%8A%E6%B3%A8%E5%86%8C%E6%88%96%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%B8%90%E6%88%B7%E6%97%B6%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E7%9A%84%E5%B8%90%E6%88%B7%E5%92%8C%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E8%B5%84%E6%96%99%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E3%80%82"><strong>您在服务上注册或更新您的帐户时提供的帐户和个人资料数据。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%A7%93%E5%90%8D%E3%80%81%E7%94%B5%E5%AD%90%E9%82%AE%E4%BB%B6%E5%9C%B0%E5%9D%80%E3%80%81%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E5%90%8D%E5%92%8C%E5%AF%86%E7%A0%81%E3%80%81%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7-id%E3%80%81%E5%B8%90%E5%8D%95%E5%92%8C%E9%80%81%E8%B4%A7%E5%9C%B0%E5%9D%80%E3%80%81%E5%87%BA%E7%94%9F%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%9F%E3%80%81%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E8%B5%84%E6%96%99%E5%9B%BE%E7%89%87%E3%80%81%E8%BA%AB%E9%AB%98%E3%80%81%E4%BD%93%E9%87%8D%E3%80%81%E6%82%A8%E6%8B%A5%E6%9C%89%E7%9A%84%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E3%80%81%E6%B4%BB%E5%8A%A8%E5%81%8F%E5%A5%BD%E3%80%81%E9%9F%B3%E4%B9%90%E5%81%8F%E5%A5%BD%E3%80%81%E5%85%B3%E6%B3%A8%E8%80%85%E5%92%8C%E6%82%A8%E5%85%B3%E6%B3%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%BA%E3%80%81%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E6%B4%BB%E5%8A%A8%E6%91%98%E8%A6%81%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A%E6%82%A8%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E5%88%B0%E5%B8%90%E6%88%B7%E8%B5%84%E6%96%99%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E4%BB%BB%E4%BD%95%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E3%80%82"><strong>例如您的姓名、电子邮件地址、用户名和密码、用户 ID、帐单和送货地址、出生日期、个人资料图片、身高、体重、您拥有的设备、活动偏好、音乐偏好、关注者和您关注的人、您的活动摘要以及您添加到帐户资料中的任何其他信息。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E4%BA%A4%E6%98%93%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E3%80%82"><strong>交易数据。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E4%B8%8E%E6%82%A8%E5%9C%A8%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E4%B8%8A%E6%88%96%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%AE%8C%E6%88%90%E8%AE%A2%E5%8D%95%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E6%88%96%E9%9C%80%E8%A6%81%E7%9A%84%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E8%AE%A2%E5%8D%95%E5%8F%B7%E5%92%8C%E4%BA%A4%E6%98%93%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%E3%80%82"><strong>例如与您在服务上或通过服务完成订单相关或需要的信息，包括订单号和交易历史。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E6%96%B9%E3%80%82"><strong>第三方。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E8%BF%98%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BB%8E%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E6%9D%A5%E6%BA%90%E6%8E%A5%E6%94%B6%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%EF%BC%9A%E5%A6%82%E6%9E%9C%E6%82%A8%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E6%96%B9%E5%B9%B3%E5%8F%B0%E6%88%96%E7%A4%BE%E4%BA%A4%E5%AA%92%E4%BD%93%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%96%E4%BB%A5%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%B0%86%E6%82%A8%E5%9C%A8%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E6%96%B9%E5%B9%B3%E5%8F%B0%E6%88%96%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B8%8A%E7%9A%84%E8%B4%A6%E6%88%B7%E4%B8%8E%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E8%B4%A6%E6%88%B7%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E4%BB%8E%E8%AF%A5%E5%B9%B3%E5%8F%B0%E6%88%96%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E3%80%82%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%EF%BC%8C%E6%AD%A4%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84-facebook%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E5%90%8D%E3%80%81%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7id%E3%80%81%E5%A4%B4%E5%83%8F%E3%80%81%E5%B0%81%E9%9D%A2%E7%85%A7%E7%89%87%E5%92%8C%E6%82%A8%E6%89%80%E5%B1%9E%E7%9A%84%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%EF%BC%88%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A1%E3%80%81%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E5%9C%BA%E6%89%80%EF%BC%89%E3%80%82%E6%82%A8%E4%B9%9F%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E6%9C%89%E6%9C%BA%E4%BC%9A%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E6%96%B9%E5%B9%B3%E5%8F%B0%E6%88%96%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E5%90%91%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E6%9C%8B%E5%8F%8B%E6%88%96%E8%81%94%E7%B3%BB%E4%BA%BA%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E7%94%B5%E5%AD%90%E9%82%AE%E4%BB%B6%E5%9C%B0%E5%9D%80%E3%80%82"><strong>我们还可能从其他来源接收个人信息，例如：如果您选择通过第三方平台或社交媒体网络登录服务，或以其他方式通过服务将您在第三方平台或网络上的账户与您的账户相关联，我们可能会从该平台或网络收集信息。例如，此信息可能包括您的 Facebook用户名、用户ID、头像、封面照片和您所属的网络（例如学校、工作场所）。您也可能有机会通过第三方平台或网络向我们提供其他信息，例如您的朋友或联系人列表以及您的电子邮件地址。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E3%80%82"><strong>自动数据收集。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%92%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E5%95%86%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E8%AE%B0%E5%BD%95%E6%9C%89%E5%85%B3%E6%82%A8%E3%80%81%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E8%AE%A1%E7%AE%97%E6%9C%BA%E6%88%96%E7%A7%BB%E5%8A%A8%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E7%9A%84%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A%E6%82%A8%E4%B8%8E%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E3%80%81%E4%B8%8E%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E9%80%9A%E4%BF%A1%E5%92%8C%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E5%9C%A8%E7%BA%BF%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%92%E5%8A%A8%EF%BC%8C%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%EF%BC%9A%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%EF%BC%8C%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E8%AE%A1%E7%AE%97%E6%9C%BA%E6%88%96%E7%A7%BB%E5%8A%A8%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E7%9A%84%E6%93%8D%E4%BD%9C%E7%B3%BB%E7%BB%9F%E7%B1%BB%E5%9E%8B%E5%92%8C%E7%89%88%E6%9C%AC%E3%80%81%E5%88%B6%E9%80%A0%E5%95%86%E5%92%8C%E5%9E%8B%E5%8F%B7%E3%80%81%E6%B5%8F%E8%A7%88%E5%99%A8%E7%B1%BB%E5%9E%8B%E3%80%81%E5%B1%8F%E5%B9%95%E5%88%86%E8%BE%A8%E7%8E%87%E3%80%81ram%E5%92%8C%E7%A3%81%E7%9B%98%E5%A4%A7%E5%B0%8F%E3%80%81cpu-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E7%8E%87%E3%80%81%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E7%B1%BB%E5%9E%8B%EF%BC%88%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E6%89%8B%E6%9C%BA%E3%80%81%E5%B9%B3%E6%9D%BF%E7%94%B5%E8%84%91%EF%BC%89%E3%80%81ip%E5%9C%B0%E5%9D%80%E3%80%81%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE%E3%80%81%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E6%97%B6%E5%8C%BA%E3%80%81%E7%A7%BB%E5%8A%A8%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E8%BF%90%E8%90%A5%E5%95%86%E3%80%81%E6%97%A0%E7%BA%BF%E7%94%B5%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%88%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%EF%BC%8Cwi-fi%E3%80%81lte%E3%80%813g%EF%BC%89%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A%E4%B8%80%E8%88%AC%E4%BD%8D%E7%BD%AE%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E3%80%81%E5%B7%9E%E6%88%96%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E3%80%82"><strong>我们和我们的服务提供商可能会自动记录有关您、您的计算机或移动设备的信息，以及您与服务、与我们通信和其他在线服务的互动，例如：设备数据，例如您的计算机或移动设备的操作系统类型和版本、制造商和型号、浏览器类型、屏幕分辨率、RAM和磁盘大小、CPU 使用率、设备类型（例如手机、平板电脑）、IP地址、语言设置、设备时区、移动设备运营商、无线电/网络信息（例如，Wi-Fi、LTE、3G）以及一般位置信息，例如城市、州或其他国家地区。</strong></h4><h4 id="2-%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF"><strong>2. 我们如何使用您的个人信息</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E5%B0%86%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%94%A8%E4%BA%8E%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%E6%88%96%E5%9C%A8%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E6%97%B6%E4%BB%A5%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E6%8F%8F%E8%BF%B0%EF%BC%9A"><strong>我们可能将您的个人信息用于以下目的或在收集时以其他方式描述：</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E4%BA%A4%E4%BB%98%E3%80%82"><strong>服务交付。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E5%B0%86%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%94%A8%E4%BA%8E%EF%BC%9A"><strong>我们可能会将您的个人信息用于：</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E3%80%81%E8%BF%90%E8%90%A5%E5%92%8C%E6%94%B9%E8%BF%9B%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%92%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%9A%E5%8A%A1%EF%BC%9B"><strong>提供、运营和改进服务和我们的业务；</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%9C%A8%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E4%B8%8A%E5%BB%BA%E7%AB%8B%E5%92%8C%E7%BB%B4%E6%8A%A4%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E8%B5%84%E6%96%99%EF%BC%9B"><strong>在服务上建立和维护您的用户资料；</strong></h4><h4 id="%E4%B8%8E%E6%82%A8%E5%B0%B1%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E8%BF%9B%E8%A1%8C%E6%B2%9F%E9%80%9A%EF%BC%8C%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E5%8F%91%E9%80%81%E5%85%AC%E5%91%8A%E3%80%81%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0%E3%80%81%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E8%AD%A6%E6%8A%A5%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81%E5%92%8C%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E6%B6%88%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%9B"><strong>与您就服务进行沟通，包括发送公告、更新、安全警报以及支持和管理消息；</strong></h4><h4 id="%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E4%B8%8E%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E3%80%82"><strong>研究与开发。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E5%B0%86%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%94%A8%E4%BA%8E%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E5%92%8C%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%EF%BC%8C%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E5%88%86%E6%9E%90%E5%92%8C%E6%94%B9%E8%BF%9B%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%92%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%9A%E5%8A%A1%E3%80%82"><strong>我们可能会将您的个人信息用于研究和开发目的，包括分析和改进服务和我们的业务。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%90%88%E8%A7%84%E5%92%8C%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E3%80%82"><strong>合规和保护。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E5%B0%86%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%94%A8%E4%BA%8E%EF%BC%9A-1"><strong>我们可能会将您的个人信息用于：</strong></h4><h4 id="%E9%81%B5%E5%AE%88%E9%80%82%E7%94%A8%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E3%80%81%E5%90%88%E6%B3%95%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E5%92%8C%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E7%A8%8B%E5%BA%8F%EF%BC%8C%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E4%BC%A0%E7%A5%A8%E6%88%96%E6%94%BF%E5%BA%9C%E5%BD%93%E5%B1%80%E7%9A%84%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%EF%BC%9B"><strong>遵守适用法律、合法要求和法律程序，例如回应传票或政府当局的要求；</strong></h4><h4 id="%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E3%80%81%E6%82%A8%E6%88%96%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E4%BA%BA%E7%9A%84%E6%9D%83%E5%88%A9%E3%80%81%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E3%80%81%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E6%88%96%E8%B4%A2%E4%BA%A7%EF%BC%88%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E6%8F%90%E5%87%BA%E5%92%8C%E6%8D%8D%E5%8D%AB%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E7%B4%A2%E8%B5%94%EF%BC%89%EF%BC%9B"><strong>保护我们、您或其他人的权利、隐私、安全或财产（包括通过提出和捍卫法律索赔）；</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%AE%A1%E6%A0%B8%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%92%8C%E5%86%85%E9%83%A8%E6%B5%81%E7%A8%8B%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E7%AC%A6%E5%90%88%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E5%92%8C%E5%90%88%E5%90%8C%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E6%88%96%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E5%86%85%E9%83%A8%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%EF%BC%9B"><strong>审核我们的服务和内部流程是否符合法律和合同要求或我们的内部政策；</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%89%A7%E8%A1%8C%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E7%9A%84%E6%9D%A1%E6%AC%BE%E5%92%8C%E6%9D%A1%E4%BB%B6%EF%BC%9B"><strong>执行管理服务的条款和条件；</strong></h4><h4 id="%E9%A2%84%E9%98%B2%E3%80%81%E8%AF%86%E5%88%AB%E3%80%81%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%E5%92%8C%E9%98%BB%E6%AD%A2%E6%AC%BA%E8%AF%88%E3%80%81%E6%9C%89%E5%AE%B3%E3%80%81%E6%9C%AA%E7%BB%8F%E6%8E%88%E6%9D%83%E3%80%81%E4%B8%8D%E9%81%93%E5%BE%B7%E6%88%96%E9%9D%9E%E6%B3%95%E6%B4%BB%E5%8A%A8%EF%BC%8C%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E6%94%BB%E5%87%BB%E3%80%81%E8%BA%AB%E4%BB%BD%E7%9B%97%E7%94%A8%E5%92%8C%E5%AF%B9%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E7%9A%84%E8%B4%9F%E9%9D%A2%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA%E3%80%82"><strong>预防、识别、调查和阻止欺诈、有害、未经授权、不道德或非法活动，包括网络攻击、身份盗用和对服务的负面行为。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%BE%81%E5%BE%97%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8C%E6%84%8F%E3%80%82"><strong>征得您的同意。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%9C%A8%E6%9F%90%E4%BA%9B%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%E4%B8%8B%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%BE%81%E6%B1%82%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8C%E6%84%8F%E4%BB%A5%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E3%80%81%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E6%88%96%E5%85%B1%E4%BA%AB%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E5%9C%A8%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E6%97%B6%E3%80%82"><strong>在某些情况下，我们可能会特别征求您的同意以收集、使用或共享您的个人信息，例如在法律要求时。</strong></h4><h4 id="3-%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF"><strong>3. 我们如何分享您的个人信息</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E4%B8%8E%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%E5%90%84%E6%96%B9%E5%85%B1%E4%BA%AB%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E5%B9%B6%E5%9C%A8%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E4%B8%AD%E6%88%96%E5%9C%A8%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E6%97%B6%E5%8F%A6%E6%9C%89%E8%AF%B4%E6%98%8E%E3%80%82"><strong>我们可能会与以下各方共享您的个人信息，并在本隐私政策中或在收集时另有说明。 </strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E4%BE%9B%E5%BA%94%E5%95%86%E3%80%82"><strong>服务供应商。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E4%BB%A3%E8%A1%A8%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E6%88%96%E5%B8%AE%E5%8A%A9%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E8%BF%90%E8%90%A5%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E6%88%96%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%9A%E5%8A%A1%E7%9A%84%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E6%96%B9%EF%BC%88%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E6%89%98%E7%AE%A1%E3%80%81%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E3%80%81%E7%94%B5%E5%AD%90%E9%82%AE%E4%BB%B6%E4%BC%A0%E9%80%92%E3%80%81%E8%90%A5%E9%94%80%E3%80%81%E5%AE%A2%E6%88%B7%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81%E5%92%8C%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E5%88%86%E6%9E%90%EF%BC%89%E3%80%82"><strong>代表我们提供服务或帮助我们运营服务或我们的业务的第三方（例如托管、信息技术、电子邮件传递、营销、客户支持和数据分析）。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%94%AF%E4%BB%98%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86%E5%99%A8%E3%80%82"><strong>支付处理器。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%82%A8%E7%94%A8%E4%BA%8E%E5%9C%A8%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E4%B8%8A%E8%BF%9B%E8%A1%8C%E8%B4%AD%E4%B9%B0%E7%9A%84%E4%BB%BB%E4%BD%95%E6%94%AF%E4%BB%98%E5%8D%A1%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E5%9D%87%E7%94%B1%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87-oculus-%E7%9B%B4%E6%8E%A5%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E5%92%8C%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86%E3%80%82"><strong>您用于在服务上进行购买的任何支付卡信息均由我们通过 Oculus 直接收集和处理。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%BD%93%E5%B1%80%E7%AD%89%E3%80%82"><strong>当局等。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%89%A7%E6%B3%95%E9%83%A8%E9%97%A8%E3%80%81%E6%94%BF%E5%BA%9C%E5%BD%93%E5%B1%80%E5%92%8C%E7%A7%81%E4%BA%BA%E5%9B%A2%E4%BD%93%EF%BC%8C%E5%9B%A0%E4%B8%BA%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9C%9F%E8%AF%9A%E5%9C%B0%E8%AE%A4%E4%B8%BA%E5%AF%B9%E4%BA%8E%E4%B8%8A%E8%BF%B0%E5%90%88%E8%A7%84%E5%92%8C%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%E6%98%AF%E5%BF%85%E8%A6%81%E6%88%96%E9%80%82%E5%BD%93%E7%9A%84-%E3%80%82"><strong>执法部门、政府当局和私人团体，因为我们真诚地认为对于上述合规和保护目的是必要或适当的 。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E4%B8%9A%E5%8A%A1%E5%8F%97%E8%AE%A9%E8%80%85%E3%80%82"><strong>业务受让者。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%94%B6%E8%B4%AD%E6%96%B9%E5%92%8C%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E5%8F%82%E4%B8%8E%E8%80%85%E5%9C%A8%E5%95%86%E4%B8%9A%E4%BA%A4%E6%98%93%EF%BC%88%E6%88%96%E6%AD%A4%E7%B1%BB%E4%BA%A4%E6%98%93%E7%9A%84%E8%B0%88%E5%88%A4%E5%92%8C%E5%B0%BD%E8%81%8C%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%EF%BC%89%E4%B8%AD%E6%B6%89%E5%8F%8A%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%E5%89%A5%E7%A6%BB%E3%80%81%E5%90%88%E5%B9%B6%E3%80%81%E6%94%B6%E8%B4%AD%E3%80%81%E9%87%8D%E7%BB%84%E3%80%81%E5%87%BA%E5%94%AE%E6%88%96%E4%BB%A5%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E5%A4%84%E7%BD%AE%E5%85%B6%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E6%88%96%E4%BB%BB%E4%BD%95%E9%83%A8%E5%88%86%E4%B8%9A%E5%8A%A1%E6%88%96%E8%B5%84%E4%BA%A7%E6%88%96%E8%82%A1%E6%9D%83-%E5%9C%A8%E8%BF%99%E7%A7%8D%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%E4%B8%8B%EF%BC%88%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E4%B8%8E%E7%A0%B4%E4%BA%A7%E6%88%96%E7%B1%BB%E4%BC%BC%E7%A8%8B%E5%BA%8F%E6%9C%89%E5%85%B3%E7%9A%84%EF%BC%89%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%B0%86%E5%B0%BD%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E5%8A%AA%E5%8A%9B%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E6%94%B6%E4%BB%B6%E4%BA%BA%E9%81%B5%E5%AE%88%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E3%80%82"><strong>收购方和其他相关参与者在商业交易（或此类交易的谈判和尽职调查）中涉及公司剥离、合并、收购、重组、出售或以其他方式处置其全部或任何部分业务或资产或股权, 在这种情况下（包括与破产或类似程序有关的），我们将尽可能努力要求收件人遵守本隐私政策。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E5%92%8C%E5%85%AC%E4%BC%97%E3%80%82"><strong>其他用户和公众。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E8%B5%84%E6%96%99%E5%92%8C%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E7%94%9F%E6%88%90%E7%9A%84%E5%86%85%E5%AE%B9%EF%BC%88%E6%B6%88%E6%81%AF%E9%99%A4%E5%A4%96%EF%BC%89%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E5%AF%B9%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E7%9A%84%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E5%8F%AF%E8%A7%81%E3%80%82%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%EF%BC%8C%E5%A6%82%E6%9E%9C%E6%82%A8%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%90%91%E4%BB%96%E4%BB%AC%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E8%B5%84%E6%96%99%E6%88%96%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E4%BE%8B%E5%A6%82%E5%BD%93%E6%82%A8%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E8%AF%84%E8%AE%BA%E3%80%81%E8%AF%84%E8%AE%BA%E3%80%81%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%E5%9B%9E%E5%A4%8D%E6%88%96%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E5%86%85%E5%AE%B9%E6%97%B6%EF%BC%8C%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E7%9A%84%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E8%AE%BF%E9%97%AE%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E3%80%82%E6%82%A8%E8%BF%98%E5%8F%AF%E4%BB%A5%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%E4%B8%8E%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E6%96%B9%E5%B9%B3%E5%8F%B0%EF%BC%88%E5%A6%82-facebook%EF%BC%89%E5%85%B1%E4%BA%AB%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%96%E4%BB%A5%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E5%9C%A8%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E6%96%B9%E5%B9%B3%E5%8F%B0%E4%B8%8A%E7%9A%84%E7%A4%BE%E4%BA%A4%E5%AA%92%E4%BD%93%E9%A1%B5%E9%9D%A2%E4%B8%8A%E5%85%B1%E4%BA%AB%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E3%80%82%E8%BF%99%E4%BA%9B%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E5%8F%AF%E4%BB%A5%E8%A2%AB%E4%BB%96%E4%BA%BA%E7%9C%8B%E5%88%B0%E3%80%81%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E5%92%8C%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%EF%BC%8C%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E8%A2%AB%E4%BB%96%E4%BA%BA%E7%BC%93%E5%AD%98%E3%80%81%E5%A4%8D%E5%88%B6%E3%80%81%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F%E6%88%96%E5%AD%98%E5%82%A8%E5%9C%A8%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E5%9C%B0%E6%96%B9%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E4%B8%8D%E5%AF%B9%E4%BB%BB%E4%BD%95%E6%AD%A4%E7%B1%BB%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%9A%84%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E8%B4%9F%E8%B4%A3%E3%80%82"><strong>您的个人资料和其他用户生成的内容（消息除外）可能对服务的其他用户可见。例如，如果您选择通过服务向他们提供您的个人资料或其他个人信息，例如当您提供评论、评论、调查回复或分享其他内容时，服务的其他用户可能会访问您的信息。您还可以选择与第三方平台（如 Facebook）共享您的信息，或以其他方式在第三方平台上的社交媒体页面上共享信息。这些信息可以被他人看到、收集和使用，包括被他人缓存、复制、截屏或存储在其他地方，我们不对任何此类信息的使用负责。</strong></h4><h4 id="4-%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9"><strong>4. 您的选择</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%AF%B9%E4%BA%8E%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E6%82%A8%E6%9C%89%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%E3%80%82"><strong>对于您的个人信息，您有以下选择。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E8%AE%BF%E9%97%AE%E6%88%96%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E3%80%82%E5%A6%82%E6%9E%9C%E6%82%A8%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E6%9C%AC%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%9C%A8%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E8%BF%99%E9%87%8C%E6%B3%A8%E5%86%8C%E4%BA%86%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E5%B8%90%E6%88%B7%EF%BC%8C%E6%82%A8%E5%8F%AF%E4%BB%A5%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95%E8%AF%A5%E5%B8%90%E6%88%B7%E6%9D%A5%E6%9F%A5%E7%9C%8B%E5%92%8C%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0%E6%9F%90%E4%BA%9B%E5%B8%90%E6%88%B7%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E3%80%82"><strong>访问或更新您的信息。如果您通过本服务在我们这里注册了一个帐户，您可以通过登录该帐户来查看和更新某些帐户信息。</strong></h4><h4 id="cookie%E3%80%82"><strong>cookie。</strong></h4><h4 id="cookie%E5%92%8C%E7%B1%BB%E4%BC%BC%E7%9A%84%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E6%9C%89%E5%8A%A9%E4%BA%8E%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%80%E4%BA%9B%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E3%80%82"><strong>cookie和类似的技术有助于我们的一些自动数据收集。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%8B%92%E7%BB%9D%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E3%80%82"><strong>拒绝提供信息。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E9%9C%80%E8%A6%81%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E4%BB%A5%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E6%9F%90%E4%BA%9B%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E3%80%82%E5%A6%82%E6%9E%9C%E6%82%A8%E4%B8%8D%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E8%AE%A4%E4%B8%BA%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E6%88%96%E5%BC%BA%E5%88%B6%E6%80%A7%E7%9A%84%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E6%97%A0%E6%B3%95%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E8%BF%99%E4%BA%9B%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E3%80%82"><strong>我们需要收集个人信息以提供某些服务。如果您不提供我们认为要求或强制性的信息，我们可能无法提供这些服务。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%88%A0%E9%99%A4%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%B8%90%E6%88%B7%E3%80%82"><strong>删除您的帐户。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%A6%82%E6%9E%9C%E6%82%A8%E6%83%B3%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E5%85%B3%E9%97%AD%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%B8%90%E6%88%B7%EF%BC%8C%E8%AF%B7%E8%81%94%E7%B3%BB%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E3%80%82"><strong>如果您想要求关闭您的帐户，请联系我们。</strong></h4><h4 id="5-%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8"><strong>5. 安全</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E9%87%87%E7%94%A8%E4%BA%86%E8%AE%B8%E5%A4%9A%E6%97%A8%E5%9C%A8%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%9A%84%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E5%92%8C%E7%89%A9%E7%90%86%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%E3%80%82%E4%BD%86%E6%98%AF%EF%BC%8C%E4%B8%8D%E8%83%BD%E4%BF%9D%E8%AF%81%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87internet%E6%88%96%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E8%BF%9B%E8%A1%8C%E7%9A%84%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E4%BC%A0%E8%BE%93%E6%98%AF-100%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E7%9A%84%E3%80%82%E5%9B%A0%E6%AD%A4%EF%BC%8C%E8%99%BD%E7%84%B6%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8A%AA%E5%8A%9B%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E4%BC%A0%E8%BE%93%E7%9A%84%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%EF%BC%8C%E4%BD%86%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E4%B9%9F%E4%B8%8D%E8%83%BD%E4%BF%9D%E8%AF%81%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF100%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%EF%BC%8C%E6%82%A8%E4%BC%A0%E8%BE%93%E6%AD%A4%E7%B1%BB%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%9A%84%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%E7%94%B1%E6%82%A8%E8%87%AA%E8%A1%8C%E6%89%BF%E6%8B%85%E3%80%82"><strong>我们采用了许多旨在保护我们收集的个人信息的技术和物理保护措施。但是，不能保证通过Internet或其他网络进行的数据传输是 100%安全的。因此，虽然我们努力保护通过服务传输的信息，但我们也不能保证您的个人信息100%的安全，您传输此类信息的风险由您自行承担。</strong></h4><h4 id="6-%E4%BF%9D%E7%95%99"><strong>6. 保留</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E9%80%9A%E5%B8%B8%E4%BC%9A%E4%BF%9D%E7%95%99%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E4%BB%A5%E5%AE%9E%E7%8E%B0%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%9A%84%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%EF%BC%8C%E5%8C%85%E6%8B%AC%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E3%80%81%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E5%92%8C%E6%94%B9%E8%BF%9B%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E3%80%81%E6%BB%A1%E8%B6%B3%E4%BB%BB%E4%BD%95%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E3%80%81%E4%BC%9A%E8%AE%A1%E6%88%96%E6%8A%A5%E5%91%8A%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E3%80%81%E7%A1%AE%E7%AB%8B%E6%88%96%E6%8D%8D%E5%8D%AB%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E4%B8%BB%E5%BC%A0%E6%88%96%E9%98%B2%E6%AD%A2%E6%AC%BA%E8%AF%88%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84-%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%86%E7%A1%AE%E5%AE%9A%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%9A%84%E9%80%82%E5%BD%93%E4%BF%9D%E7%95%99%E6%9C%9F%E9%99%90%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E8%80%83%E8%99%91%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%9A%84%E6%95%B0%E9%87%8F%E3%80%81%E6%80%A7%E8%B4%A8%E5%92%8C%E6%95%8F%E6%84%9F%E6%80%A7%E3%80%81%E6%9C%AA%E7%BB%8F%E6%8E%88%E6%9D%83%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E6%88%96%E6%8A%AB%E9%9C%B2%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E9%80%A0%E6%88%90%E7%9A%84%E6%8D%9F%E5%AE%B3%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%E3%80%81%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%9A%84%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%E7%AD%89%E5%9B%A0%E7%B4%A0%E3%80%82%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E5%8F%AF%E4%BB%A5%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E5%AE%9E%E7%8E%B0%E8%BF%99%E4%BA%9B%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%EF%BC%8C%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A%E9%80%82%E7%94%A8%E7%9A%84%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E3%80%82"><strong>我们通常会保留个人信息以实现我们收集信息的目的，包括提供、保护和改进服务、满足任何法律、会计或报告要求、确立或捍卫法律主张或防止欺诈目的. 为了确定个人信息的适当保留期限，我们可能会考虑个人信息的数量、性质和敏感性、未经授权使用或披露您的个人信息可能造成的损害风险、我们处理您的个人信息的目的等因素。个人信息以及我们是否可以通过其他方式实现这些目的，以及适用的法律要求。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%BD%93%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E4%B8%8D%E5%86%8D%E9%9C%80%E8%A6%81%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E6%94%B6%E9%9B%86%E7%9A%84%E5%85%B3%E4%BA%8E%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E6%97%B6%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%9A%E5%B0%86%E5%85%B6%E5%88%A0%E9%99%A4%E3%80%81%E5%8C%BF%E5%90%8D%E5%8C%96%E6%88%96%E5%B0%86%E5%85%B6%E4%B8%8E%E8%BF%9B%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A5%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E5%BC%80%E6%9D%A5%E3%80%82"><strong>当我们不再需要我们收集的关于您的个人信息时，我们可能会将其删除、匿名化或将其与进一步处理隔离开来。</strong></h4><h4 id="7-%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E7%9A%84%E5%8F%98%E6%9B%B4"><strong>7. 本隐私政策的变更</strong></h4><h4 id="%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E4%BF%9D%E7%95%99%E9%9A%8F%E6%97%B6%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E7%9A%84%E6%9D%83%E5%88%A9%E3%80%82%E5%A6%82%E6%9E%9C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%AF%B9%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E8%BF%9B%E8%A1%8C%E9%87%8D%E5%A4%A7%E6%9B%B4%E6%94%B9%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%B0%86%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E7%9A%84%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%9F%E3%80%81%E5%B0%86%E5%85%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E5%9C%A8%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E4%B8%8A%E5%B9%B6%E9%87%87%E5%8F%96%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E7%9A%84%E4%BB%BB%E4%BD%95%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E6%AD%A5%E9%AA%A4%E6%9D%A5%E9%80%9A%E7%9F%A5%E6%82%A8%E3%80%82%E6%A0%B9%E6%8D%AE%E6%AD%A4%E7%B1%BB%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%EF%BC%8C%E5%AF%B9%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E7%9A%84%E4%BB%BB%E4%BD%95%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9%E5%B0%86%E5%9C%A8%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9%E5%90%8E%E7%9A%84%E7%89%88%E6%9C%AC%EF%BC%88%E6%88%96%E5%9C%A8%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E6%97%B6%E5%8F%A6%E6%9C%89%E8%AF%B4%E6%98%8E%EF%BC%89%E5%90%8E%E7%94%9F%E6%95%88%E3%80%82%E5%A6%82%E6%9E%9C%E6%82%A8%E4%B8%8D%E5%90%8C%E6%84%8F%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9%E5%90%8E%E7%9A%84%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%EF%BC%8C%E8%AF%B7%E4%B8%8D%E8%A6%81%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E6%9C%AC%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E3%80%82"><strong>我们保留随时修改本隐私政策的权利。如果我们对本隐私政策进行重大更改，我们将通过更新本隐私政策的日期、将其发布在服务上并采取法律要求的任何其他步骤来通知您。根据此类其他要求，对本隐私政策的任何修改将在我们发布修改后的版本（或在发布时另有说明）后生效。如果您不同意修改后的隐私政策，请不要使用本服务。</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E8%81%94%E7%B3%BB%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC"><strong>如何联系我们</strong></h4><h4 id="%E5%A6%82%E6%9E%9C%E6%82%A8%E5%AF%B9%E6%9C%AC%E9%9A%90%E7%A7%81%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E6%88%96%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86%E5%81%9A%E6%B3%95%E6%9C%89%E4%BB%BB%E4%BD%95%E7%96%91%E9%97%AE%EF%BC%8C%E6%82%A8%E5%8F%AF%E4%BB%A5%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E8%81%94%E7%B3%BB%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%EF%BC%9A"><strong>如果您对本隐私政策或我们的信息处理做法有任何疑问，您可以通过以下方式联系我们：</strong></h4><h4 id="%E7%94%B5%E5%AD%90%E9%82%AE%E4%BB%B6%EF%BC%9A-team7u163com"><strong>电子邮件： <u>team7u@163.com</u></strong></h4>
        </div>


        <footer class="post-footer">

            <div class="authors">

        </footer>

    </section>

</main>


<script>
    var images = document.querySelectorAll('.kg-gallery-image img');
    images.forEach(function (image) {
        var container = image.closest('.kg-gallery-image');
        var width = image.attributes.width.value;
        var height = image.attributes.height.value;
        var ratio = width / height;
        container.style.flex = ratio + ' 1 0%';
    })
</script>
